original_text: And some fell upon a rock; and as soon as it was sprung up, it withered away, because it lacked moisture.
korean_text: 더러는 바위 위에 떨어지매 싹이 났다가 습기가 없으므로 말랐고

sentences.original_text: And some fell upon a rock
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어떤 씨앗이 바위 위에 떨어졌고

sentences.original_text: and as soon as it was sprung up
